newsitem.title: USA: Idaho Power, Snohomish PUD form alliance.
newsitem.headline: Idaho Power, Snohomish PUD form alliance.

text.p: Idaho Power Co and Washington state's Snohomish County Public Utility District (PUD) said Thursday they have formed an alliance to jointly develop and market new energy products and services.
The utilities said they will work together on power supply, energy management, natural gas service, fuel management services, marketing and sales.
The partners said the alliance will help them maintain their independence, better serve existing customers and benefit from deregulation of the electric utility industry.
Combined, the utilities will have a customer base large enough to increase purchasing power and cost-effectiveness, the partners said in a release.
